name: 1973 prism - the Dark Side of Stylus
description: This Stylus theme is dark with colourful accents for both the Stylus edit style and styles management pages as well as the settings, options, export and information screens.
additional_info:
Notes:
  • The theme displays a clear visual identifier on top of a code block to indicate that code has been modified.
  • It also introduces a new theme for the code editor (CodeMirror) that is based on the okaidia theme for PrismJS by @ocodia, which in turn was loosely based on the Monokai textmate theme by @monokai.
Instructions:
  • To activate this 1973 prism theme for CodeMirror, simply select the Default theme in the Stylus settings,
  • Press F5 to refresh once or twice if the editor still shows black on white after activating the default theme.
